variables.alert-authorization-provisory-not-define: It is not allowed to change any user data without provisional authorization.
variables.alert-password-invalid: Incorrect password! You have #tentativas# more attempts, otherwise you will be automatically disconnected!
variables.alert-password-invalid-finish: Incorrect Password! You have been automatically disconnected from the system due to excessive incorrect password attempts. You will need to provide username and password to access again.
variables.alert-there-is-a-field: There is already a registration for the field #label# with the same value: #value#. Please choose another #label# and try again.
variables.alert-user-inactive: User inactive in the system, please contact support to restore your account.
variables.alert-user-or-password-invalid: Invalid username and/or password. Please try again.
variables.alert-without-permission: You do not have permission to access this location.
variables.restrict-area-info: Please enter your password below and then click the Send button to provisionally authorize the modification of any sensitive data in your account.
variables.login-keep-logged-in-label: Keep my account active in this browser
variables.forgot-password-message-content: If yes, fill in the Email field and then the Confirm Email field. Then the system will send a message to the email address provided. Follow the instructions in this message to create a new password.
variables.alert-user-email-invalid: There is no registration in the system with the email provided: #email#. Please check if the email sent was entered correctly and try again.
variables.forgot-password-confirmation-message-con: A message with instructions to change your password was sent to the following email: #email#. Please access your email client and follow the instructions sent.
variables.forgot-password-mail-subject: Reset Your Conn2Flow Account Password nº #numero#
variables.alert-redefine-password-expiration-or-in: The token sent has expired. It is necessary to redo the process and try again.
variables.redefine-password-message-header: Do You Want to Reset Your Password?
variables.redefine-password-message-content: If yes, fill in the Password field and then the Confirm Password field. Then, click the Reset button to change your password.
variables.redefine-password-confirmation-message-c: Now you can access the system with your username and password. To do this, click #url#.
variables.alert-recaptcha-invalid: Your request was not accepted because our automatic security system considered it to be made by a robot. Please try again, but if the problem persists, please contact us by clicking #url#.
variables.alert-already-exists-email: The email provided is already in use! Choose another one and try again.
variables.alert-email-not-sent: There was a problem and it was not possible to send the email. Try again, but if the problem persists, contact technical support.
variables.password-redefined-mail-subject: Conn2Flow Account Password Reset Successfully nº #numero#
